title: Pepper
description: A dark, coarse, smoky and grainy spice.

title: Salt
description: A sharp, white mineral from sea or rock.

title: Beef Broth
description: A thick and hearty broth made from beef stock.

title: Leek
description: A large, thick-leafed member of the onion family.

title: Carrot
description: An orange, stiff, bright-tasting root vegetable.
